info.title: Nordic Smart Government and Business API
info.description:
With this API you can retrieve information about legal entities (includes company, business, sole trader, non-profit association etc). 

The API use POST instead of GET because we don't want to display identification number (which can be considered sensitive personal data) in the URL.

### Links

[Download as YAML](./v2.yaml)

[Download as JSON](./v2.json)

[Datamodel for the API](http://uri.suomi.fi/datamodel/ns/nsgb)

tags.name: nordicinformation
tags.description: API to retrieve data about legal entities.

tags.name: isalive
tags.description: API to control the status of the service.

get.description: With this operation you can check to see that the API is up and running.

post.summary: Retrieve data about a legal entity
post.description: With this operation you can retrieve data about a legal entity.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: Client generated ID to call the API. In case of error this will be sent in the attribute `requestId` or as a header attribute.

get.description: Get basic information about a legal entity using URI identifier. Note that URI identifier should not change over time, meaning that this API path should be version independent. If there ever is a need to change the path or domain for the API gateway, original domain and path should still remain for redirecting the request by using permantly moved (301) response to the original domain and path.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: Client generated ID to call the API. In case of error this will be sent in the attribute `requestId` or as a header attribute.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the legal entity.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Defaults to application/json. Alternatively application/json-ld can be used.

get.summary: Retrieve information about organisations signatory rights
get.description: With this operation you can retrieve information about organisations signatory rights.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: Client generated ID to call the API. In case of error this will be sent in the attribute `requestId` or as a header attribute.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the legal entity.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Defaults to application/json. Alternatively application/json-ld can be used.

post.summary: Retrieve financial statements for the SMEs.
post.description: With this operation you can retrieve financial statements for the SMEs.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: Client generated ID to call the API. In case of error this will be sent in the attribute `requestId` or as a header attribute.

LegalEntityQuery.title: LegalEntityQuery
LegalEntityQuery.description: Object to request data about a legal entity.

notation.description: A unique set of characters used to identify the legal entity. In Sweden this is one of 'organisationsnummer', 'personnummer', 'samordningsnummer' or 'gdNummer'.

country.description: The country you want request data from. Valid values are 'SE', 'NO', 'FI', and 'IS'.

includeSignatoryRights.description: If true, signatory rights will be included in the response.

Identifier.title: Identifier
Identifier.description: A unique set of characters used to identify the legal entity.

issuingAuthorityName.title: issuingAuthorityName
issuingAuthorityName.description: The name of the public authority responsible for issuing the identifier.

notation.title: notation
notation.description: A string of characters to uniquely identify a legal entity

Address.title: Address
Address.description: The registered address is the address, to which formal communications can be sent to the legal entity. The postal address is the address to which mail can be sent to the legal entity.

fullAddress.title: fullAddress
fullAddress.description: The complete address written as a string, separated with ";".
fullAddress.example: Queen Street 1; 23456; City of Gold; Sweden

LegalForm.title: LegalForm
LegalForm.description: The legal form of a legal entity.

code.title: Code
code.description: The legal form code of an agent according to a national scheme based on national legislation. In this model the code is the nationally registered code with a country prefix. Example: "SE_AB". For the EU form Societas Europaea the legal form code SE i sused for all countries.

name.title: Name
name.description: The national name of the legal form with a specific code expressed in the field legalForm.code. Name is in local language. Example "Aktiebolag"

Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: An active deed or action carried out by a registred organisation.

inClassification.description: NACE codes are published in scheme http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/ux2/nace2/nace2. Description in text for all NACE codes in all EU languages can be found there.

reference.description: Reference to the description of the NACE code.

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: Sequence for the NACE codes, primary = 1, secondary = 2

LegalStatus.title: Legal status
LegalStatus.description: An indication of whether a business register has registered some extraordinary proceedings for the agent

code.title: Code
code.description:
* `NONE`: No extraordinary circumstances registered.
* `SOME`: Some extraordinary circumstances registered.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Indicates the Role that the Agent plays in a Membership relationship with a legal entity

notation.description: Code for the role the agent have in the legal entity

prefLabel.description: The preferred label for the role the agent have in the legal entity

Person.title: Person
Person.description: A individual human being who may be dead or alive, but not imaginary.

fullName.title: Full name
fullName.description: The complete name of the Person as one string.

dateOfBirth.title: Date of birth
dateOfBirth.description: The point in time on which the Person was born. Persons can be registered with a membership in a legal entity whithout a identifier being a national registration number.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents some position within an organization that exists independently of the agent or agents filling it. A post can be held by multiple persons or legal entities.

SignatoryRule.title: Signatory Rule
SignatoryRule.description: Rules that dictates how signatory rights are to be used and each rule grants representation power

alone.title: Alone
alone.description: Constraint property that requires exactly one of the agents holding a post to sign.

majorityOf.title: Majority of
majorityOf.description: Constraint property that requires majority of agents holding a post to string.

allOf.title: All of
allOf.description: Constraint property that requires all of the agents holding a post to sign.

oneOf.title: One of
oneOf.description: Constraint property that requires one of the agents holding a post to sign.

twoOf.title: Two of
twoOf.description: Constraint property that requires two of the agents holding a post to sign.

threeOf.title: Three of
threeOf.description: Constraint property that requires three of the agents holding a post to sign.

fourOf.title: Four of
fourOf.description: Constraint property that requires four of the agents holding a post to sign.

fiveOf.title: Five of
fiveOf.description: Constraint property that requires five of the agents holding a post to sign.

SignatoryRights.title: Signatory rights
SignatoryRights.description: Signatory rights describe mandates that gives power to an agent to represent a legal entity

description.title: Description
description.description: Text description of the signatory rights. The signatory rights can be coded at company registration authorities but we just provide the description here.

signatoryRules.title: Signatory rule
signatoryRules.description: Rules that dictates how signatory rights are to be used and each rule grants representation power

LegalEntity.title: LegalEntity
LegalEntity.description: Legal Entity (includes company, business, sole trader, non-profit association etc) that is registered with a business registration authority or other public authorithy.

registrationDate.title: registrationDate
registrationDate.description: The date when a public authority has registered the legal entity.

name.title: name
name.description: A word or a combination of characters by which a legal entity is designated, called, or known.

LegalEntityInLinkedData.title: LegalEntity
LegalEntityInLinkedData.description: Legal Entity (includes company, business, sole trader, non-profit association etc) that is registered with a business registration authority or other public authorithy.

@context.title: @context
@context.description: A context is a JSON object that expresses a set of mappings from IRIs to terms.

registrationDate.title: registrationDate
registrationDate.description: The date when a public authority has registered the legal entity.

name.title: name
name.description: A word or a combination of characters by which a legal entity is designated, called, or known.

instance.description:
A certain value on `instance` is a unique type of error but also associated with a `type`, that is one value on `instance` shall only occur with a value on `type`.

**General**: `about:blank`
- `not.found` information not found
- `server.error` internal server error

**Access control**: `urn:bolagsverket:error:auth`
- `auth.error` authentication error

**Validation**: `urn:bolagsverket:error:validation`
- `validation.client` validation error of client request

**Network**: `urn:bolagsverket:error:network`
- `network.timeout` network timeout
- `network.error` internal network error

timestamp.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format.

requestId.description: Identity associated with the API call, sent in header X-Request-Id.

detail.example: Identitetsbeteckning m√•ste vara 10 eller 12 siffror: A7696151111

code.description: The error as a pre-defined code. A possible use case of this field, is for different logic in the client.

source.description: Name of the parameter causing the error.

FinancialStatementQuery.title: FinancialStatementQuery
FinancialStatementQuery.description: Object to request data about a legal entity.

notation.description: A unique set of characters used to identify the legal entity. In Sweden this is one of 'organisationsnummer', 'personnummer', 'samordningsnummer' or 'gdNummer'.

country.description: The country you want request data from. Valid values are 'SE', 'DK', 'NO', 'FI', and 'IS'.

period.description: Period of the financial statements, which can either an year, date or a duration

DocumentInfo.title: DocumentInfo
DocumentInfo.description: The document info object contains metadata information necessary to correctly process the rest of the document.

documentType.description: The type of the document. Always https://xbrl.org/2021/xbrl-json.

features.description: A set of features supported by the document.

xbrl:canonicalValues.description: If true, the document contains canonical values.

xbrl:allowedDuplicates.description: This feature allows an xBRL-JSON document to declare what classes of duplicate facts, if any, are permitted in the report.

xebr:incomeStatementPresentation.description: This feature allows an xBRL-JSON document to declare what report type is used for the income statement.

namespaces.description: A set of namespaces used in the document.

taxonomy.description: A set of taxonomy files used in the document.

Dimensions.description: Represents the dimensions associated with a fact

concept.description: Defines meaning for the fact. The value of the concept property is a CURIE representing URI from XBRL taxonomy that identifies the concept.

entity.description: Specifies the entity to which the fact relates. Preferred identifier is the LEI code.

period.description: Defines the period in time to which a fact relates, which will be either an instant or a duration

unit.description: Specifies the units in which a numeric fact is reported in CURIE format. The unit value iso4217:EUR represents Euro as defined in the ISO currency code list.

noteId.description: A reference to a note that provides additional information about the fact.

Links.title: Links
Links.description: Related links to other facts and footnotes.

value.description: Value of the fact encoded according to XBRRL-JSON specification

decimals.description: Description of accuracy of amount as integer or absent if the value is infinitely precise. -6 means accurate to millions. -3 means accurate to thousands. -2 means accurate to hundreds. 0 means accurate to units. 2 means accurate to cents. 4 means accurate to a hundreth of a percentage point (Basis point).

Facts.title: Facts
Facts.description: A set of financial facts in xBRL-JSON format.

LegalEntityRequest.description: An object to specify `notation` (a unique set of characters used to identify the legal entity) and `country` (the country you want request data from).

value.description: The managing director can sign alone or two board members together

signatoryRules.description: The managing director can sign alone

value.description: The managing director AND the director of the board can sign together

signatoryRules.description: The managing director AND the director of the board can sign together

value.description: The managing director OR the the director of the board can sign alone

signatoryRules.description: The managing director can sign alone
The director of the board can sign alone

value.description: The managing director and two board members together

signatoryRules.description: The managing director and two board members together

FinancialStatementResponse.description: Reply with requested financial statement data.
